name: Edge Balance 3D
description:
Edge Balance 3D is an amusing, simple yet a very addictive game. Edge Balance 3D is a 3D puzzle, logic and arcade game. This game has combined elements of puzzle and arcade.
You just need to balance your ball through Arrow Keys. Variety of obstacles and amazing routes are waiting gor you. Grab another oppurtunity to plunge into thrilling and challenging atmosphere of balancing the ball. Various elements and obstacles are being introduced as one moves to another level, resulting into more challenging atmosphere as the game progresses. Moreover, this game develops your logical thinking. Test your reflexes against time
and motion.

Features:
- Amazing game modes and Cool 3D graphics & effects
- Realistic atmosphere and physics
- Compatible with all tabs and mobile devices
- Game Center support
- Smooth game play and Clear user interface
- Simple and intuitive touch controls
- Share screenshots directly to Face book, Twitter and email
- Social network sharing

New levels are added regularly, so stay tuned!!!
